description: This file defines the AppDatabase class for an Android app using Room persistence library. It specifies the database schema, entities, DAOs, and a singleton instance provider to access the database.

classes.name: AppDatabase
classes.description: Abstract class that extends RoomDatabase, serving as the main access point to the Room database, including DAO getters and a singleton instance method.

methods.name: contactDao
methods.description: Abstract method returning the ContactDao for database operations related to contacts.

methods.name: dealDao
methods.description: Abstract method returning the DealDao for database operations related to deals.

methods.name: taskDao
methods.description: Abstract method returning the TaskDao for database operations related to tasks.

methods.name: noteDao
methods.description: Abstract method returning the NoteDao for database operations related to notes.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Companion object function providing a singleton instance of AppDatabase, creating the database if it doesn't exist.
